lines.text: [last lines]

[answering a phone call]
Hello?
Kim, I know who you are.
[brief pause; Stephen's voice turns menacing]
You killed my brother.
[Kim screams in terror]
I have a great game.
What's that?
Um, I Saw What You Did.
I saw what you did and I know who you are.

[Julia caught the oven mitts on fire]
We having barbecue?
Yeah, barbecue oven mitts.
How about barbecued brains? Yours!
You had a naked guy at your fingertips and you hung up?

[watching Adrian through the window]
Do you think he'll like us?
I don't think he's my type, he looks sensitive.
How about me? Do you think he'll like me?
Why don't you go ask him and find out?
I would.
Would what?
After driving all the way out here and putting on a nice dress, I'd go and meet him.
Well I'm not you.
He's gone.
That's it, let's get out of here.
Wait, you're just going to let a golden opportunity just slip through your hands?
Yes.
No! It won't be the same tomorrow. There's the front door, go for it.
What do I say to him?
You're the diplomat's daughter, you figure it out.
What's your name?
It's Ellen, Ellen Jones.
Ellen Jones, nice name, have we ever met before, Ellen?
Uh, no, I don't think so. So you're a musician.
How did you know?
Lucky guess, I saw your guitar over there.
I'm going to have bad dreams.
So am I.
Can I sleep with you tonight?
No, Julia, go to bed!

Adrian, you are the most creative person I've ever met. Everything you try to do you do better than anybody I've ever known. But you're utterly defenseless, you let the bad in with the good, it's a damn curse. But just think, just think how long you've had it under control. Now look, if it ever starts to overwhelm you again, tell me about it. Let me help, the two of us stick together through it, that's okay.
What did you girls do all night?
We watched TV, what else is there to do?
Did your friend have a boyfriend over?
No and neither did I if that's what you're getting at. We watched TV.
What're you doing out here?
I had a bad dream.
What was it this time?
The man with no teeth.
He had teeth, Julia.
He didn't in my dream.

[into radio]
Adrian Lancer, trouble, 29707?
Code 6, Charles, exercise extreme caution, repeat, exercise extreme caution. No risks, Milly, this guy torched his parents, we just got a call from his brother. You hear me?
[Adrian speeds off]
Headed west on Mulholland and Forest running.
police have attempted to apprehend a suspect in connection with the body found earlier this evening. The suspect, one Adrian Lancer of West Hollywood, engaged veteran policemen
Oh my God.
on a chase speed chase on Mulholland Drive.
What is it, Lisa?

The chase ended when Lancer lost control of his car and plummeted nearly 100 feet to a fiery death. Police were operating on a tip from the suspect's brother, Stephen Lancer. Apparently the suspect had a long history of mental illness and was institutionalized after setting a series of fires, one of which resulted in the death of his parents. The body found earlier this evening has now been identified as Robyn Griffin, the suspect's girlfriend. We'll keep you informed for any further developments.
Lisa, do you know anything about this? Lisa?
No! It's just, horrible and scary, that's all.

[on phone]
Kim, you're never going to believe what I just saw on the news. That guy, Adrian Lancer, he killed his girlfriend tonight! Kim?
Lisa, what're you talking about?
The guy is whacked! The police they drove after him and he drove off a cliff and he killed himself!
Lisa, he's not dead, he was just here.
